metadata.title: CVE-2024-45021 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:memcg_write_event_control(): fix a user-triggerable oopswe are *not* guaranteed that anything past the terminating NULis mapped (let alone initialized with anything sane).
